mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RICEBALL.TBL_FILES_PROFILES tfp WHERE USERS_NUMBER = #{usersNumber}
DELETE FROM RICEBALL.TBL_FILES_PROFILES tfp WHERE USERS_NUMBER = #{usersNumber}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(MATCH_NUMBER) FROM tbl_matchings WHERE TBL_MATCHINGS.CARE_NUMBER = #{usersNumber} AND MATCH_STATUS = 'S'
